Sample Certificate & Custom Template

Sample Certificate File

The default certificate can be found here. A sample of a certificate with custom template can be found here.

You may view the certificate on the Ropsten network, using https://dev.opencerts.io

Sample Custom Template

Sample custom template can be found at https://github.com/GovTechSG/opencerts-website/tree/master/src/components/CertificateTemplates
